DOC.brief_summary: Thirteen hospital China participate study , aim provide data transcutaneous bilirubin ( TcB ) level first 168 hr birth term late-preterm neonate , develop hour-specific TcB nomogram . The investigator hypothesize hour-specific TcB nomogram predict neonatal hyperbilirubinemia term late-preterm Chinese infant , plan appropriate follow-up hyperbilirubinemia newborn .
DOC.brief_title: Development TcB Nomogram Identify Neonatal Hyperbilirubinemia Term Late-preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Neonatal hyperbilirubinemia common ; always benign condition . If leave untreated , devastating consequence include cerebral palsy hearing loss . It therefore critical able identify newborn risk severe hyperbilirubinemia .
DOC.criteria: Term latepreterm newborn infant GAs ≥35 week birth weight ≥2,000 g include . All sick newborn infant admit intensive care unit .
